Articles.Content:
So, i got one little question.

How can i, well, optimise the game? It\'s lagging a little bit, and i turned of everything that can eat graphics. But it\'s still lagging

Any suggestions about how to reduce lags with non-standard methods?

PC specs?

1 ghz proc, nvidia6800 gt, 1.5 gb ram

Hi

It looks like your computer specs are lower than the minimum requirements for the game http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=System_Specs

You need to upgrade your pc to run KSP properly...more ram, better processor, better video card. To sum it up you need a brand new Pc.

Cheers

1 ghz proc, nvidia6800 gt, 1.5 gb ram

Well, here\'s how I see it. I\'m currently playing KSP and it takes 1.1 GB or Ram and about 20-30% of a 2500k so as the above poster says: Your PC is too outdated to play KSP...

Meh, a 3.2 GHz Pentium 4 w/ 1 Gig of RAM can run KSP. Right up until the black terrain issue of 0.14.2, I would have considered a shaders 2 card (slower than his GeForce 6) the actual minimum, also. >_>

@Tzeapa: 1 GHz isn\'t very specific, what generation is it?

As for hidden settings, as of 0.14.2 and later: edit settings.cfg

change settings to the following:

PLANET_SCATTER = False

PLANET_DETAIL_FACTOR = 0.5

Also, stick to smaller (<100 part) rockets.
Black terrain fix and some optimisations are coming in the next patch also will be able to force the game into SM2 mode to give you a bit more speed.
